Source: WHO Multi-Country Cholera Outbreak Reports 2024-2025
Description: WHO surveillance reports confirming countries reporting cholera outbreaks - CIV absent

Source: PubMed Five Years Cholera Surveillance Ivory Coast 2001-2005
Description: Comprehensive surveillance study during political crisis period with detailed outbreak data

Source: WHO Disease Outbreak News 2002 Cholera Côte d'Ivoire
Description: WHO official outbreak report with case and death counts

Source: ReliefWeb Cholera Outbreak Côte d'Ivoire 2011
Description: Humanitarian response documentation of Abidjan outbreak with detailed statistics

Source: WHO Weekly Epidemiological Record Cholera 2014
Description: Official WHO surveillance data for 2014 multi-district outbreak

Source: Côte d'Ivoire Ministry of Health Press Release 2025
Description: Official government announcement of 2025 outbreak in Abidjan with case fatality data

Source: Institut Pasteur Abidjan Laboratory Reports 2001-2025
Description: Vibrio cholerae laboratory confirmation and strain analysis across multiple outbreaks

Source: WHO AFRO Regional Cholera Surveillance System
Description: Regional surveillance framework showing CIV surveillance integration and reporting patterns

Source: African Cholera Surveillance Network Africhol Reports
Description: Multi-country surveillance network with CIV participation and Institut Pasteur Abidjan involvement

Source: West Africa Regional Cholera Epidemic 2005 Documentation
Description: UN documentation of West Africa cholera epidemic with country-specific case and death data

Source: Lancet Cholera Seasonality Sub-Saharan Africa Study
Description: Statistical modeling study showing unique CIV seasonal patterns vs neighboring countries

Source: WHO Global Cholera Update 1996
Description: WHO surveillance report documenting 1995 cholera outbreak with detailed case and death statistics

Source: West Africa Regional Cholera Epidemic Synchrony Study
Description: Academic research on regional cholera transmission patterns and climate synchrony in Gulf of Guinea

Source: WHO Global Health Observatory Cholera Surveillance Data 1990s
Description: WHO official surveillance database with annual cholera case numbers for African countries

Source: Community-Based Surveillance Côte d'Ivoire Guinea Border 2016
Description: MoH community-based surveillance project in 3 districts along Guinea border with quantitative signal reporting

Source: Academic Study Epidemic Silence Côte d'Ivoire Post-Conflict 2005-2014
Description: Academic analysis of epidemic silence institutional practice and surveillance gaps in post-conflict Côte d'Ivoire

Source: Africhol Network Surveillance Sensitivity Study Côte d'Ivoire
Description: Academic study documenting CIV case definition sensitivity 46.5% (lowest among 7 countries in Africhol network)

Source: Post-Conflict Health System Reconstruction Analysis Côte d'Ivoire 2005-2012
Description: Comprehensive academic analysis of post-conflict health system reconstruction challenges and surveillance capacity impacts

Source: IPCI 2012 Cholera Mission Report Water Sampling Study
Description: Institut Pasteur Côte d'Ivoire comprehensive water sampling study following 2011 cholera outbreak with 362 samples from wells lagoons and wastewater

Source: Archives Nationales d'Outre-Mer French Colonial Medical Records
Description: French colonial medical archives 1925-1961 covering 40+ countries including Côte d'Ivoire health services with 1970-1971 West Africa cholera outbreak documentation

Source: Methodist Missionary Society Ivory Coast Oxford Archives
Description: Oxford University Manuscripts and Archives collection covering Protestant Hospital Dabou medical records 1967-1982 under Dr. Paul Heath Snell

Source: AFD French Development Agency Health Cooperation Côte d'Ivoire
Description: Comprehensive health system strengthening programs with documented outcomes including maternal mortality reduction from 614 to 385 per 100000 live births 2012-2021

Source: AngloGold Ashanti Health Surveillance and Epidemic Monitoring Programs
Description: Mining company comprehensive health surveillance including epidemic monitoring for COVID-19 Marburg Ebola monkey pox and malaria control programs

Source: Abidjan Informal Settlements Cross-Sectional WASH Access Survey 2021-2022
Description: Cross-sectional study examining spatial distributions of diarrheal cases and housing conditions in Abidjan informal settlements with 1714 households surveyed

Source: Vibrio Contamination Risk Assessment Coastal Towns Côte d'Ivoire Crustacean Consumption Study
Description: Research on Vibrio transmission risk from crustacean consumption in coastal CIV towns with quantified contamination levels household consumption and illness rates

Source: EpiSurveyor Surveillance System Training Côte d'Ivoire 2013
Description: WHO Africa training program for epidemiological surveillance using EpiSurveyor software for real-time disease reporting including cholera

Source: DHIS2 Implementation Côte d'Ivoire COVID-19 Surveillance System
Description: District Health Information System 2 pilot implementation across 18 CIV districts including Abidjan for COVID-19 and disease surveillance

Source: Community-Based Surveillance Training CDC Côte d'Ivoire 2023
Description: CDC technical assistance training 459 community health workers in event-based surveillance and community-based disease surveillance
